mapper.select:
select T1.id, T1.user_id userId, T1.project, T1.description, T1.material, T1.material_specifications materialSpecifications, T1.personnel_requirements personnelRequirements, T1.inspection_standards inspectionStandards, T1.operating_rules operatingRules, T1.equipment, T1.doc_name docName, T1.doc_url docUrl from production_process_diagram_tbl T1
and T1.user_id = #{userId}
and T1.project LIKE CONCAT('%', #{project},'%')
order by id desc
